divs: Sighting Detailswe were at our local social club with the children outside playing.the children ran in to me and told me to quickly follow them to see something strange. as i went out into the open field I witnesed six lights in the sky wich wre in a triangular formation in threes.the first three moved upwards and gradually faded away these were followed by the last three which did the same.the chidren told me it had started with two orange lights comming from what looked like the ground behind the trees in the distance,these were imediatly followed by several more approx 15.all the children witnessed this and my 17 year old daughter got some footage on her mobile phone which does not look like normal air trafficThese lights were orange and appeared circular .They went into a formation.All of us were fasinated and amazed
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bexleyheath
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Series of lights in triangular formation.
